page.title: 13MOBBERLEY CRICKET CLUB
page.content:
The Cricket Club was founded in 1876 but has played on its present ground near the Church since 1891. Two teams play on Saturday and one on Sunday and there is a team of juniors. The Club is a member of the Cheshire League which comprises twelve teams.
In 1976, Mobberley C.C. celebrated its centenary with a full weeks cricket including a match against a Cheshire eleven.
In 1982 the Selangor Club of Kuala Lumper played Mobberley C.C. and a reciprocal visit was made in September 1984. Mobberley won the first but lost the second game.
